attributes.action: Allow England to have it’s own parliament, as does Scotland, Wales and N Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow the English to have a say as to how England is run, and introduce or repel specific regulations for England.
ENGLAND is a country and NOT as now depicted in encyclopaedias
“part of the British Isles”

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
